Bill Lockyer , California's state treasurer, participated in a national telephonic news conference with EPI officials, to denounce the bankruptcy concept. No state needs to declare bankruptcy, Bill Lockyer said, "The states have sovereign taxing power the big companies don't." Bill Lockyer 's point-- a valid one-- is that bankruptcy is the refuge for individuals, corporations and local governments

Andy Coulson one degree of separation to the McCann affair: McCann family spokesman Clarence Mitchell joins CCHQ as head of media monitoring for the election www.prweek.com PR Week has the story: The Conservative Party has signed up Clarence Mitchell , best-known as spokesman for Madeleine McCann's parents, as the head of media monitoring for its general election campaign, PRWeek can exclusively reveal. " Clarence Mitchell joins the Tory comms operation today, reporting directly to director of communications Andy Coulson . Clarence Mitchell , who was the director of the Government's media monitoring unit for two years( 2005-2007) will take a back room role, monitoring the progress of the Tories' campaign in the media. The pro-plan union members avoid the streets and meet at an auditorium to listen to their leadership. "The crisis has been under way for three years," the man on the podium says. Many industries are dying, banks are holding on to their money, if nothing improves, unemployment will skyrocket this year. We want to ensure our future. That's why we broke labor unity and approved the Sergio Marchionne plan. The union that's been left alone is the powerful left-leaning metal workers. win with a critical rebound and putback with 43 seconds left. Carmelo Anthony 's work on the boards earned glowing praise from Allen Iverson after the game. He finished with 14 rebounds, two shy of his career high. When he puts his mind to it, he can do anything on the basketball court, Allen Iverson said. "He can dominate in every aspect. Rebounding, that's all effort. When Carmelo Anthony gets down low and starts banging with those guys, it's hard for people to defend him."
